FindLaw Legal Pulse Story FindLaw: AP News 3 months ago A bold move in the small world of college chess
COLUMBIA, Mo. (AP) — It was one of the most brazen moves in the chess world since the Najdorf Sicilian Defense, perhaps even the Blackmar-Diemer Gambit. Fresh off her second straight national championship, the legendary chess coach at Texas Tech is jumpi Full Article at FindLaw: AP News

When the program decided to move to St. Louis, I didn't have to think twice. SOURCE: FindLaw: AP News 3 months ago What these kids have done in the short time they've been here is amazing ... They've put us in some niches where we haven't been before. They've put us in some countries where we haven't been before. SOURCE: FindLaw: AP News 3 months ago St. Louis today is the center of chess in America. It just seemed like a perfect fit. SOURCE: FindLaw: AP News 3 months ago View all Related Quotes »
